price: "Allah julgará, entre vós, no Dia da Ressurreição, por aquilo de que discrepáveis."
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَحۡكُمُ بَيۡنَكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ فِيمَا كُنتُمۡ فِيهِ تَخۡتَلِفُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaḥkumu baynakum yawma al-qiyāmati fīmā kuntum fīhi takhtalifūna
